name: Empire Penguin - Money Tycoon
description:
Hey Boss! Come and play the ultimate idle clicker game and live like a business tycoon!. Build your empire up from rags to riches and become the wealthiest tycoon around in this crazy addictive tapping adventure!.

Buy businesses and tap to make lots of money!
Hire managers and assistants to run your shops!
Upgrade your empire and increase profits!
Research powerful upgrades and dominate the market!
Build your business empire and be rich and famous!
Strike a deal with investors and grow your fortune!
Collect FREE time warps and skip ahead of time!

Do you dream of becoming rich? Well listen closely Boss!... Here at Empire Penguins we can make all that come true. We need someone to transform our world and construct a mighty business tower, Do you think you can do that? In return we will make you famous!, Oh.. and very very rich!.

Empire Penguins Features:

BECOME SUPER RICH
Simple yet highly addictive gameplay, Tap the businesses and watch your money fly in!
Use all the BOOSTS to your advantage to collect even bigger REWARDS!
Watch your money pile up and INVEST to earn more!
IDLE CLICKER
Make money when you’re not playing!
Hire manages to take control of your property and you don’t have to worry about missing a dime!
RESEARCH
Join the research team to cut costs and double profits!
Upgrade your businesses to perform FASTER and better!
PRESTIGE
Sell your empire for HUGE profits
Invest your new money on an even BIGGER EMPIRE!

Plus so much more! Your Empire is waiting Boss!

If you have any issues, or have found a bug please contact us! support@aceviral.com
View our privacy policy here https://aceviral.com/privacy
